data: {"generalSituation":"Under the influence of a strong replenishment of the northeast monsoon, temperatures over the coast of Guangdong will drop slightly in the next couple of days. The weather over the region will be cool in the morning, generally fine and very dry during the day, with a rather large temperature difference between day and night. On the other hand, Tropical Cyclone Koto will move across the southern part of the South China Sea in the next couple of days. It will then move in the general direction of the vicinity of Vietnam and the seas south of Hainan Island, and is expected to gradually weaken under the influence of the northeast monsoon. A band of clouds will gradually cover the northern part of the South China Sea and the coast of Guangdong during the weekend to early next week. There will be one or two rain patches over the region.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251127","week":"Thursday","forecastWind":"North force 5, occasionally force 6 offshore, up to force 7 on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Fine. Cool in the morning.
